website_summaries.verdict: Great for video games, movies, and watching the big game, and you may be surprised at the visual fidelity that this inexpensive little LED projector is capable of.
cons: This projector doesn't include a smartphone adapter or internal battery

customer_reviews.title: NOT 1080p. NOT 1920x1080
customer_reviews.text: The product description is very deceiving. First thing it says is "supports 1920x1080". If you scroll way down you'll notice in the comparison chart it says "native resolution 840x400". This projector inputs 1080p (1920x1080) image from your PC, so in your computer settings it seems like a 1080p display, then compresses the image to display on the 840x400 pixels it projects. The image is so choppy you can't even read text on the display because each letter is only a few pixels. DO NOT BUY if you're looking for even half-decent image quality. Edit -- bringing up to 3 stars for good customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Alex G.

customer_reviews.title: Home theater
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Vankyo Leisure 3 Portable Projector two weeks ago. It arrived 2 days after ordering and I was very excited to try it out. My wife removed it from the box and set up was so easy. We had it working in just a matter of minutes. The surface we are currently using isn’t the best, but we plan to use the 100-inch 16:9 Collapsible Projector Screen in the near future. This is a must have projector and we are happy we purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Thoroman

customer_reviews.title: I really wanted to like this product
customer_reviews.text: Things to consider before you buy. Pros: -for $89 this product can deliver -GUI is easy to use -compatible with everything and provided extra cables to help with connectivity. -carry case is nice -update: outstanding customer support, I was contacted in reference to my issues shortly after posting this review to discuss my concerns. The support alone will keep me as a customer in the future! Good customer support is hard to find. Cons: -no Bluetooth -no perfect focus but does provide a wide range to the focus and key stone -only mono sound (even with Bose hooked up)
customer_reviews.author: EJR

customer_reviews.title: I Want a reimbursement
customer_reviews.text: I bought this projector on saturday, It is the first time I am using this projector and after 30 minutes this black circle started to appear
customer_reviews.author: Michael Alvarez

customer_reviews.title: Will not even cover a 120” screen
customer_reviews.text: Like most others have said, the picture quality is just ok. The resolution states that it is 1080p but what it really is is 800x400 which is 480p. When you go to focus you can either focus the middle only or the the top or bottom only. And they lie straight through their teeth when they say it supports a 170” screen. I have a 120” screen and it’s maybe able to do the size of a 84” TV. I wish I hadn’t waited so long to unbox this and use it otherwise I would’ve returned it right away. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: steven

customer_reviews.title: Customer support
customer_reviews.text: this product is compact and ergonomic looking. It turned on effortlessly but the fan didi not turned on so when the LED lamp heats up the casing, it turns itself off. It cools down and it turns itself back on this cycle is repetitive. However I contacted customer support and they address the malfuncitional issue promptly by replacing the product. The replacement projector works flawlessly
customer_reviews.author: Enrique Chang

customer_reviews.title: Great affordable projector.
customer_reviews.text: Got this yesterday and so far we love it. We bought it for watching movies outside. The kids were super excited to use it but couldn't use it outside last night. They tried it out by watching a movie on the ceiling! I was impressed with how good the picture was even when it wasn't completely dark and how good the picture quality is. The speakers are quieter than we like so we hooked it up to an external speaker with an aux cord. I think we are going to love it. I'll update if we have any problems.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: This light weight projector works great in my backyard for family movie night and date night. Easy to set up and use. Plug and play. I can start to see the screen pretty well about an hour before sunset on my white painted backyard wall. We can connect our Samsung smart phone but not the Google Pixel 3a. Laptop worked too. The speaker on the projector caught me off guard as it's pretty loud and has solid sound quality. Picture is good for movies but not for professional presentations. Haven't tried live TV but I imagine it works well.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Theisen

customer_reviews.title: 👍👍 Two thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: This was the best $90 I spent. I bought it to watch movies in the back yard. It’s works great, every night we are just waiting for the sun to set, to watch movies. Comes with cables and a nice carrying case for storage. Works with Apple TV, google chrome, and amazon fire stick. My video is just projecting against my house, No screen.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price. Better with external speaker. Needs total darkness.
customer_reviews.text: This projector is good for its value. Don't expect amazing audio or picture quality. They're more than good though, just not amazing. I'd recommend an external speaker for this device. Also, it supports Amazon Fire Stick at 1080p. The brightness for this device isn't strong enough for a lit room. I'd recommend complete darkness for watching shows/movies. The size and noise of the projector makes it perfect for watching movies in a small outdoor setting. I used it on my last camping trip.
customer_reviews.author: jonathan j.

customer_reviews.title: Great bundle of stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Love this projector! Was so simple to set up and use and displayed a photo and video slideshow well on a 120 inch screen. Only suggestion I have would be for better instructions on how to display pictures large from where grid. I only found out after I hit pause then play again and it automatically changed the display! Would definitely buy recommend! I especially love how all the cords needed and he carrying case were included and the price was still less then other similar products! Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: I really like this projector however,
customer_reviews.text: I purchase this projector, it was delivered the next day, I took the projector out the box to set it up and the remote control did not work. I remember reading through the reviews and seeing that other customers were complaining that their remote did not work. This issue needs to be address. If I do not get a new remote I will be returning this projector and getting something else. This is the only reason for the low rating. Maybe thats why the remote did not come with batteries because this company knew that the remote control did not work. When I purchase something I expect it to work.
customer_reviews.author: Lillie Mclean

customer_reviews.title: No product support, poor documentation
customer_reviews.text: The ad says it works with smartphones and it is plug and play; don't believe it. The documentation consist of just four pictures that says you need an addition adapter with an HDMI and mini end to go into the phone; fine. I purchased the adapter but no picture. I contact Amazon support and they couldn't resolve the problem. Had to send the projector back because I don't believe this projector is capable of working with my smart phone.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Weller

customer_reviews.title: i mean, it works i guess
customer_reviews.text: picture quality isn't very good, colors look way off, it's not very bright. it was easy to figure out, setup, and it gets stuff on the screen... that stuff might be misshapen and the wrong colors, but if it's a power point presentation, it'd be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Bean

customer_reviews.title: Updated 08/28/2020
customer_reviews.text: 08/28/2020 update. I will leave my original review from 7/28/2020 listed below - but have updated this as they have went above and beyond with their communication to satisfy. They have been in continual contact in an attempt to resolve the issue. For their excellent customer service I am bumping to 4 stars. 7/23/2020 Unless your viewing in almost total darkness this is a waste of time and money! I even attempted it in the living room approx 4 feet away from the wall....it was daylight outside - not bright inside - a faint image on the wall. Pitch black viewing is better. Screen adjustments are minimal at best. Save your money and put towards something better.
customer_reviews.author: Flyboy

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive indoor home option
customer_reviews.text: Intended to use for outside viewing on a large screen. The picture remains fairly blurry across the bottom especially even with keystone and focus corrected. Mine arrived with scuffed black marks right out of the package. I don't believe it's affected the functionality, but could be due to rough factory handling. Sound quality will work well for indoor use, and using it to project an image less than 100" would be most ideal. It's a decent option for something on the cheaper side for indoor use in my opinion. I'll definitely be purchasing something different for a larger outdoor projection in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very nice product..buy a Lightning Digital AV adapter if you want to connect it to an iphone
customer_reviews.text: i got my projector within a few days of ordering it! it has really nice quality picture and sound wise. it can project in different sizes and theres an apparatus you can adjust to tilt the frame of the picture/projection. i would definitely buy this instead of buying a tv since it connects to your phone. the only thing is that you have to purchase a separate cable to connect it to your phone (i have an iphone). you can buy it on amazon or basically anywhere (i got mine from best buy), you need to get a ~lightning digital AV adapter~ if you have an iphone. other than that im very happy with my purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: Impoy-Bee-Jay

customer_reviews.title: Compact projector with Great video quality!!!
customer_reviews.text: Projector shows very nice and sharp picture quality. I like that the sound is neither too loud nor too low. Also you can adjust it. I have set it up in bedroom to watch animation movies with my kids and for movie time with friends/family. Its a must have projector!!! I have recommended it to my friends who enjoyed it at our home. Goodness packed in small package. I am very happy trusting this company for a projector. Will recommend it to everyone!
customer_reviews.author: reader

customer_reviews.title: It’s Great!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it! Theater-style feeling at home. I don’t have it hard mounted yet, but i hope to do it soon. For now, an easy rig to get it to project correctly does just fine. By itself, the built-in speaker can be loud, but it obviously won’t allow you to hear everything a larger speaker or surround sound system would, but it did great the first few times before i got all the accessories i needed. I hook up my Chromecast too it and just stream from my phone. If there is a downside, it’s just the noise that the built-in fan makes. But if you’re into the movie/show you’re watching, you don’t even notice it. Definitely an awesome product!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: I don't know what I expected
customer_reviews.text: The picture is clear at about 4 1/2 feet but after that it is fuzzy and really can't be expanded to a very large size with any clarity for a PowerPoint presentation. I am used to using projectors that cost thousands of dollars so I admit I am spoiled as to quality and size of picture. It is very quite and was very easy to set-up although the instructions left a lot to be desired. Came with plenty of cables for any set-up. Worth the price, will give to thee kids to use.
customer_reviews.author: neonleon

customer_reviews.title: Great unit-if you can figure out the controls.
customer_reviews.text: Overall, this projector provides a “quality” experience at a “value” price. The sound is MUCH better than we expected. Bright, clear picture. My only complaint is we had a lot of difficultly getting started. The quick start guide was useless! Finally we found a real manual on line and downloaded that. It was NOT a simple plug in and play operation as YouTube videos had us believing. The issues for us was lack of clear instruction and intuitiveness of controls/remote - when to press the OK button, and when to press the ENTER(?) button. After a good bit of frustration, we finally figured it out, and are enjoying our projector.
customer_reviews.author: JWW

customer_reviews.title: Remote useless, still very neat toy
customer_reviews.text: A small, basic way to watch movies from my computer on a big screen. Image doesn't get perfectly crisp most of the time and haven't gotten the color adjustment flawless yet but definitely enough to enjoy a good flick or series in style in your backyard or wall. I bought a cheap, stretchy screen and use suction cups to attach to windows (or mirror closet doors) and magnets to metal surfaces in interior and on exterior of the house. Genius toy and decent bang for buck since legit quality projectors will cost several hundred. Hoping it lasts, only had it for a few weeks yet!
customer_reviews.author: autodidact

customer_reviews.title: Look elsewhere
customer_reviews.text: We've only been using this projector somewhat infrequently since August and already it's no good. It was mediocrebut okay for the price when we first set it up, but now the picture is super blurry, making movies/shows passable at best and anything with text (such as games) completely unplayable. No amount of adjustment fixes it. It's also far from bright. It's set up in our basement so there's no huge light sources, but even at night with all the lights off the picture is visibly dim. Really disappointed that it's became a big paperweight after so little time and so far out of the return window. No wonder it's constantly discounted.
customer_reviews.author: Kia

customer_reviews.title: Great mini projector, especially for price
customer_reviews.text: This mini projector made for a great gift. It has all of the cables included, except an attachment for your phone (need to buy separate). Perfect for hooking up to laptop, DVD player, etc. The picture is pretty good... can be a bit blurry towards the edges, even when focused. However, that could be because I’m projecting onto a wall instead of a screen. Other projectors cost hundreds of dollars, so I was really interested in this one since it was much cheaper. Would recommend— great value.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Initial review
customer_reviews.text: We just set this up. I read a lot of reviews and I never read about there being a problem with HDMI firestick and UBS. The problem we had was our fire stick uses the HDMI and the USB - the HDMI port and USB are to close together and cannot use the fire stick. The fire stick blocks the USB port once plugged into the HDMI port. For now we will use a splitter but that is not at all what I wanted. Given this was on the cheaper side, I guess I’ll say I got what I paid for. I will update on quality of projector when we use in a few days. So far not happy.
customer_reviews.author: SunnyDay

customer_reviews.title: Great for holiday projections
customer_reviews.text: I bought this projector for my holiday displays. I wish it had a wide angle short throw. But, for the price and what I’m using it for. It’s perfect! The video is the Atmosfx product “Jack’O’lantern Jamboree”. I loaded it onto a thumb drive and plugged it into the projector. I hooked up a speaker and put it behind the pumpkins. (The video is projected onto real pumpkins). We are looking to get another as this one has worked so well.
customer_reviews.author: Big Mamma

customer_reviews.title: worth it
customer_reviews.text: decided to get a projector rather than tv since It takes less space and I am happy with the purchase. I have it on my bed frame thing and its pointing to the foot of my bed and that's about 13 ft from the wall NOT SURE. you can adjust how it angles and 'zooms' according to placement. cons are not as bright but good enough if you're in a completely dark room and my gamer bf says the quality is ass but that's just him. volume comes out of the projector and can sound muffled so i recommend connecting your device to a speaker for that theater surround sound effect
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: save your money get one thats brighter.
customer_reviews.text: got for our bar that has small windows but virtually little light. Not nearly bright enough to clearly see. We have seen other bars that have them and I believe the Lumes (sp) are just not enough. Also the remote must be level with the unit, so placing unit high means a ladder to click on and off. I was going to return the package but Amazon wont let me complete the process, not the fault of the vendor but it still is a jerk move by them. I guess I spent the money on the bundle , its my own fault for believing the return policy.
customer_reviews.author: Dad who reviews

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the job I needed it for.
customer_reviews.text: This projector really works for me. I’m an artist & I’m using it to project my drawings & compositions onto my canvas to create the outline for the beginning of my paintings. I take photos on my iPhone of my 6” drawings & project them with great clarity onto my 3 or 4 foot canvases to begin my painting process. It is saving me over 3 hours of work each time over my previous process allowing me to complete each painting in less time. I tried less expensive projectors which I returned since they didn’t have enough resolution or brightness. This one is a keeper.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ahern

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Fine for low resolution applications for kids, but don't expect high quality at this price. The DAC (digital to analog converter) has too few bits. Hence, sharp lines in your image between dark and light or between colors will show as a line of quantized squares, i.e. blurry. Ditto the optics, a little poor. But for games or TV in very dark rooms, it might work fine for you. Works for my low rez application, but if I need more, will have to buy up.
customer_reviews.author: Brett Williams

customer_reviews.title: I really like the carrying bag
customer_reviews.text: Wow, this projector really surprises me! Now I can setup my home theater. The display is very clear, bright and sharp. I connected it with my Android TV box and they work perfectly! The display is impressive especially in the dark room! I am using it to watch movie almost every night. Also, I really like the carrying bag. It's so convenient to bring along. The minor comments I can give is the noise of the fan. But overall, this is a perfect choice. I loved it and highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Coe

customer_reviews.title: Works with Roku, but not my phone or laptop.
customer_reviews.text: This projector works great with Roku. However, I purchased a lightning cable separately thinking I could use my phone with this projector, but it doesn't work. I tried my laptop, and it will only show my home screen, or desktop, and won't show the movie even when the movie is playing in the laptop. I'm disappointed because to use my Roku, I'll have to drag two long extension cords outside when watching movies outdoors. I was counting on my phone working or a laptop and then I’d only have to have one extension cord for the projector.
customer_reviews.author: KristyW

customer_reviews.title: How do we know if the reviews are real?
customer_reviews.text: I was very skeptical about ordering this projector. I know nothing about the brand VANKYO. It seems that Amazon mostly?....often? sells products with names that are quite unfamiliar. It was definitely my experience with this projector. I saw no options for projectors with names with which I am more familiar. And as a result, I rely heavily on the reviews. This one had over 6K positive reviews. But within minutes of opening the box, turning it on, it switched on and then it did not come back on. So, I'm returning...... Amazon, it seems, has outgrown itself. I don't know what to trust anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Peter S Camp

customer_reviews.title: It's a scam!  DO NOT PURCHASE!!!
customer_reviews.text: Well, I guess I have been snookered by Amazon (Best Seller!) AND Vankyo (whoever THAT is!)! I bought this last fall to use by the pool this summer. When will I learn to open my purchases and make sure they work before that return window closes?? I'm just now opening it and the lights come on but it doesn't work! I've purchases 2 different adapters and neither makes it work. The only way to contact the company was through an email that now comes back as undeliverable. A complete scam!
customer_reviews.author: klf2717

customer_reviews.title: Good for the Money
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this projector to help with my Halloween decorations. It is a good projector that works well in this situation. It was not quite as bright as I would have liked but as long as its being used in a dark area you should be just fine. If you are looking to use this in lit rooms for presentations, I do not believe its bright enough. Overall I feel its a good projector and a good value.
customer_reviews.author: Brett Neilson

customer_reviews.title: Quality projector
customer_reviews.text: Picture quality is great - Very clear, and the projector has ports to hook up speakers. This is a great feature as we connected several different speakers until we found the best sound for outdoors. The projector comes with its own zippered case that is also of great quality. My family & I are really happy with this product. We’ve watched several outdoor movies and shows using our firestick which gave us the capability to watch any & everything- all of our paid subscriptions like Disney, Netflix, etc. I bought the suggested stand that works really well for the perfect height & is super sturdy. I highly recommend this projector.
customer_reviews.author: LeeLee

customer_reviews.title: Great entry Level Projector!
customer_reviews.text: I love this projector, especially in times like this where we are stuck indoors. Been watching movies & TV shows with my girlfriend on this and been so comfy and happy. The only two little cons I had is that the receiver for the remote to read is behind the projector which is annoying because the projector is always behind us and the controller can't read the commands but it's alright and we have to make sure to keep it in a well cooled environment or it can overheat also understandable. Other than that we love this projector and already recommend all of my friends and family to pick on up to use during this lockdown!
customer_reviews.author: Alex Perez

customer_reviews.title: Great for smaller screen viewing
customer_reviews.text: The picture is clear for up close and smaller screen use. The problem we ran into is when trying to project to a large screen size. We purchased two mounts with it to be able to keep the projector at the recommended distance for the size. Could not get the picture to come in clear! Adjusting the focus ring, distance, lighting - even changed cables to “better quality” ones. Nothing worked. Kind of embarrassing since we ordered a fight and invited lots of people to watch the blurry screen! Pros - the accessories are a nice addition, especially the storage bag. The instructions are clear and helpful!
customer_reviews.author: Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to our Summer Staycation Entertaining
customer_reviews.text: We got this projector to replace an older projector which did not have as many features and most importantly a 4K HDMI port. I love that we can project from back of the screen as this keeps kids from toppling the projector by accident in the dark . We had a social distancing movie night for out friends on the 4th of July, 2020 and everyone loved the experience . I would’ve loved the picture to be brighter , but we are still learning the features and maybe can fix it in the settings . The projector comes with a useful manual and overall , I would recommend this projector as a great addition to summertime outdoor entertaining!
customer_reviews.author: Neeta A.

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality and Value
customer_reviews.text: This projector performed much better than I thought it would, given its relatively low price. I must confess that I used it for something it is specifically not recommended for — a business presentation, using Apple’s Keynote. And I used it in a room with low light rather than the dark room that is recommended. And it worked great. Image was clear and sharp in an room light enough for the audience to take notes. My presentation does not have audio, so I cannot comment on that, but I will say that they fan noise from the projector was practically non-existent. Nobody could hear it. So that was also great.
customer_reviews.author: Ohioan

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price but certainly not a high-end solution
customer_reviews.text: This product was cheap, small and easy to set up. My biggest issue with it was the picture quality. The picture in the center of the wall was bright and clear but all of the corners were significantly less bright/clear and it was frustrating to view. The larger the screen (i.e. the further away the projector was from the wall), the more amplified and noticeable this problem was. I had the projector about 10 feet from the wall and the corner brightness/clarity of the screen were not satisfactory. I ultimately returned the product.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Best Quarantine Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this a bit before all of the COVID-19 problems started. It was the best thing I could have purchased for this quarantine period. Since we couldn't go to the movies, we brought the movies to us. We cleared a wall in our living room, made a make-shift stand for the projector, and microwaved some popcorn. With all the movies being released on streaming services, it actually felt like we were at the movie theater. If you have a loud speaker, you can connect it to the projector for better sound, though the projector has an OK speaker built in. Overall, great purchase. Would recommend 10/10.
customer_reviews.author: Marcela Vijil

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended for business use - poor projection of word, excel and powerpoint
customer_reviews.text: Small and lightweight - those are the only good qualities. Projector was not very bright, would need to be used in very dark room. Also needs to be pointed directly at screen - the keystone adjustment to account for pointing the device slightly at an upward angle (very common) doesn't work well. The minimal instructions included in the box say recommended for video, but not for word, powerpoint or excel which is what I needed. If you project a Word document and can finally get the top portion of it in focus, the bottom half will be completely blurred. I didn't try using video, but if you can't project some words clearly, I can't imagine video would be crisp.
customer_reviews.author: MT

customer_reviews.title: Impressive Little Projector
customer_reviews.text: I am really impressed with this little projector. I was up and running in minutes. It is small but powerful. The speaker seems pretty good. The picture seems bright and clear, as others state, it isn't great at displaying fonts so I would not use it for a computer monitor long term. I was pleasantly surprised to see the little case it came in to keep the cables and items together. I marked it 4 star on Picture quality due to font. I marked it 4 star on remote, because the receiver is on the back. I think it makes more sense to have it on the front (or maybe as a 360 dome on top).
customer_reviews.author: DeeWhit

customer_reviews.title: Great Budget-Friendly Projector
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with the VANKYO Leisure 3 mini projector. Got this along with a sidebar and a screen for outdoor viewing. Works great, comes with plentiful connection options and accessories, and shows up bright and clear even on a 14-foot screen. Setup is easy (just plug the HDMI cable into a media player, console, or computer), and the included carrying case aids with both portability and easy storage. I would recommend this to anyone looking for a rock-solid projector to expand home theater options, but who is not ready to shell out thousands of dollars for a 4k rig.
customer_reviews.author: Brendan L. Agnew

customer_reviews.title: No PowerPoint?!?
customer_reviews.text: Not rated for PowerPoint. Not very bright, or clear, or loud. Not sure where this fits in the market. I see no use if I can’t watch movies or do presentations. Returning.
customer_reviews.author: Urban Okie

customer_reviews.title: Great value is a small package.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great projector for creating a cinema like experience at home. The picture quality and brightness are good, and it even has a small speaker inside the unit. I would not suggest trying to use it as the speaker for watching a whole movie but it would work for a couple people. The set up is quick and easy and you can be watching your movie in a matter of minutes. It comes with one VGA, one HDMI, and one A/V (red, white, and yellow) cable. The remote is nice and compact and works well. I like that it all comes nicely packaged in a case that contains all components for easy storage and travel.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 7

customer_reviews.title: It's ok
customer_reviews.text: If you need to use the keystone correction, it's not in alignment with the focal point so only one third of the screen will be in focus. Only direct front alignment of the projector to the screen will allow for the whole image to be in focus. The throw distance to get a 100" image is over 10 feet from the screen so this is more of a medium/long throw configuration, but the lumens are not high enough to support the distance and have a decent picture. At about 8' you get a pretty bright picture and nice color saturation. Works best in a light controlled room without any keystone correction.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Rudd

customer_reviews.title: It really works!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this projector in November 2019 while I was in the midst of selling my home and moving to a new city so I never got to use it until now. I was amazed by how easy it is to setup the projector and use it. Clear pictures (movies) and the brightness is much better than expected. The remote control is great to control the projector. While I'm not planning to use the projectors speaker, it works well to review the setup before I use it in a big location with AUX connected to external sound system. Focus and Keystone adjustments work well. And it all comes in a handy carry bag. This is a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Mort23

customer_reviews.title: Easy Setup, Great Picture!
customer_reviews.text: This was incredibly easy to set up! I’m not super tech savvy and I had zero issues playing a dvd from my laptop within minutes. I didn’t find the fan to be too loud.. It was slightly noticeable, but quickly became very very “background” to me. The case that comes with it is wonderful! Very easy to tote all the pieces around, and is padded and secure. I couldn’t get the remote to work for volume, but that may have been a laptop setting.
customer_reviews.author: C. Hollz

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: This projector is cheap (in varying degrees apparently) and sounds like a chainsaw. It works for what I'm using it for, something to watch movies on, however I would be too embarrassed to turn this on with company. I've had mine for a few month and an internal piece has come loose and is blocking part of the lens from the inside, which shows in the projection. It is adjustable in brightness and warmth, but height and angle adjustability is questionable. You may want to save your money for a better projector if you want to hear your movie, but it will do, despite the flaws.
customer_reviews.author: Ajh

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I purchase this to play the video games and watch You Tube videos outside on my roof top deck. I must say it was better than I thought. Not looking for HD quality viewing pleasure, just wanted a nice picture to use outside. The noise is very low and the brightness is fitting for my use. If you want the highest quality for a good price this is it. The higher price tag projectors may perform to what others are complaining about but this one is great for the price. Would recommend this product for playing video games and watching videos.
customer_reviews.author: Dicetouch

customer_reviews.title: Only Vankyo for Me!
customer_reviews.text: The reviews here are for “Real”!! When I first tried it, I was regretful cause it was not what I expect but I just need to wait for it to warm up and it did work properly. Picture / resolution quality was great and on par with the pricey ones. Sound was enough unless you prefer louder that external speakers are needed. Connectivity were easy access. My only problem is and still trying to figure out is the right tilt to get a perfect rectangular shape the frame. I have to keep inserting a book but I think a tripod might help with my issues. —Overall: Highly Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: fita

customer_reviews.title: Need adapters to connect to laptop or iphone
customer_reviews.text: Giving this four stars because I am hopeful. We haven't yet got to use this projector because it does not come with adapters needed to connect to Iphone or MacBook. Once we figure out what we need and get the correct adapters, I hope this works great. It looks like a nice projector and I love that it has its own carrying case to keep everything in. Keeping my fingers crossed that we can get it working. Unfortunately, we bought this several months ago and are just now trying it out so, if it doesn't work, the "return" window and "support" time on this has expired.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma 2 four

customer_reviews.title: Very solid projector
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product to watch movies in my room on a bigger screen than my laptop. The carrying case that it comes in is very nice, it comes with all connector cables that you would need to plug something in, and the picture quality is very clear. The adjustable focus and keystone let the picture look good from anywhere. I would definitely recommend this projector to anyone who just wants to save money on not buying a TV or just someone who is looking for a good projector.
customer_reviews.author: Brant Menswar

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product (1 Year Review)
customer_reviews.text: I bought this projector in May 2019 and have been using it for over a year now. We mostly use it to watch movies during the evenings from the comfort of our bedroom and have used it at least for 7-8 hours every week. The projector is bright enough to view the picture clearly if the blinds are closed. Also, the sound from the projector fills our entire room. I was a bit skeptical about was the durability of a non-name brand projector when I purchased it. After using it for more than a year, I can vouch for it. Well worth the money and one of my best purchases on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: samyuktha

customer_reviews.title: Bargain Find!
customer_reviews.text: I have to say for the price, this projector delivers. I've done research on the internet. I've read reviews. Pound for pound price and quality, this projector delivers. Bought it for my daughter for Christmas. She has been asking for one and I didn't want to buy one until I got a chance to do my research. Needless to say, what people have been saying about this projector are true. Sure it may not be the quality of the BIG DOLLAR projector but for streaming movies and videos, you can't beat the quality of this one. Much sharper than I expected. The controls really allow you to dial it in when making the screen bigger......might need to get myself one.
customer_reviews.author: Gary E. Hays

customer_reviews.title: Perfect portable projector
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my art studio and was a little skeptical because of the price. I was pleasantly surprised when I opened the box, because the size is perfect for traveling and it’s not going to take up too much space in the studio. It’s perfect for movies, gaming, and transferring my digital art to a canvas. It’s very well built and easy to use. The manual is simple to follow and I had no problems setting it up for the first time. I do wish that more technical information were included in the manual, but I think it would be simple enough to find the information that I might need.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Noe

customer_reviews.title: Use after Dark Outside
customer_reviews.text: I have had this projector just under a year. It works just as advertised. The pic is too late, and can normally be used when completely dark out,Which can be a problem with small kids, it's after their bedtime. It has been difficult to use for this reason. However, this is a personal difficulty. It works well, pic is clear, and the set up is easy. The speaker is loud enough, but I often pair my smartphone and use a Bluetooth operation in pair. I would recommend this product. Great for a late adult night outside. Can be used inside with no issues, darken the room and it is instantly a movie theater.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Hatcher

customer_reviews.title: Great Projector for this price range!
customer_reviews.text: With two young babies a night at the movies doesn’t exist at the moment. We wanted something to give us the feel of the big screen in the comfort of our home. We also didn’t want to break the bank. This projector is perfect for what we were looking for. It is light and portable so we can put it pretty much anywhere. It’s not going to give you the best resolution but it’s also not hundreds of dollars. The picture is very bright. We actually bought this one after comparing it to another at the same price range.
customer_reviews.author: Jim/Jen

customer_reviews.title: I am so impressed!
customer_reviews.text: I am so impressed with this projector. I purchased it to give a presentation to a homeschool group. When I received it, I found the packaging awesome. Everything was neatly packed and included extra cables - HDMI and VGA. Set up was easy. I didn't have to read the instructions. The quality of the picture, as well as the sound is amazing. And the price can't be beat. I initially purchased a cheap $50 mini-projector, but had to return it for poor quality. This project was just $40 more, and included much more value for the price. Buy it. You will be glad you did!
customer_reviews.author: Elaine M. Chandler

customer_reviews.title: Best if used in the dark, especially when using it outdoors.
customer_reviews.text: Love our projector. We use for family movie nights and/or when we have huge family reunions. It has come really handy especially recently since we cannot go to the movies due to Covid-19. We are able to connect it to our SONOS system and hear the movie throughout the entire backyard through our sound system and Rock speakers. The only thing I don't like is that projector needs to sit at least 3' off the floor to be able to get the best picture(angle). Not having a tripod, it can make things challenging to find things smaller than a coffee tablet or end table.
customer_reviews.author: chantel

customer_reviews.title: Great Projector
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this item with minimal expectations since the price point was much lower than others and it is a mini projector. I must say I was pleasantly surprised when the projector exceeded my expectations. We didn’t have a proper screen so we used a white bedsheet but it didn’t matter. The picture was clear, bright, and huge!!! It’s helped take our movie nights to the next level. We’ve been really happy to have this projector, especially during COVID. Since we couldn’t physically go to a movie theater, this certainly is the next best thing. If only we could figure out the popcorn...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for your money
customer_reviews.text: This projector packs a lot of punch for being so small! The picture quality was good. Set up was a little touch and go for until I figured it out. I feel like the instructions could be a little more thorough. Also the HDMI provided did not work. Luckily we have a few extras on hand. Haven’t tried the other connections yet. Overall good value though
customer_reviews.author: Norma-Jeane

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money
customer_reviews.text: This is my first experience buying a projector and I am quite pleased. I'm sure it doesn't compare to an expensive one but I wouldn't know the difference. I was able to hook it up to my cell phone, I have a Note 9. All I did was purchase a C-Cable to HDMI converter and connected it to the HDMI cord included with the projector. You will need a dark room to be able to see it well. We tried it during the day and then at night and it definitely needs to be dark. The speaker on it is good, but it does have an aux output. I took a wireless speaker I had and it sounded good.
customer_reviews.author: Wynee Rodz(jnxt231)

customer_reviews.title: Quality image at a great price
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this projector after several days of research. I read multiple reviews of this projector and several others. I was looking for an inexpensive projector that still had a quality image. This projector has a picture that makes our family movie time entertaining and fun! Setting up was easy and navigating the settings for the best picture possible was simple enough. Our living room is narrow, so the projector sits 8.5’ from the screen. I was still able to adjust the picture to fill the screen and have a crisp image. I am incredibly happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle N

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal, Decent Bargain Projector.... Awesome for casual use!
customer_reviews.text: I was just looking for a basic, occasional use, inexpensive projector for movie watching. After seeing the reviews I decided to give it a try. I am glad I did. It has decent brightness and clarity. It is a budget projector, so the native resolution is not what a $1000 projector would be, but certainly way adequate enough to watch a movie with family and friends. VERY easy to set up and my firestick works GREAT with the projector. I had it set up and watching a movie in just 3 minutes. Recommend. It came well packaged and comes with a great carrying case too!
customer_reviews.author: Long Time on Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price
customer_reviews.text: The great; -Long lamp light. -Connection ports. -Not that loud. The good; -Image quality. -Design of the unit. All the controls on the remote is on the unit. -Runs cool. The OK; -The brightness and contrast setting doesn't seem to make the pictures look any better when you crank it up. I had to crank it down because it was too saturated. -The remote had issues making good contact with the batteries, took me awhile to really sit it in there, after that it is good. The bad; -The cord is like 3 feet long. Get a cord extender. -The screw that tilts the unit up is about an inch tall, so you will not be using that.
customer_reviews.author: MrPandaladin

customer_reviews.title: Great so far!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! First we hooked it up to our kids karaoke machine (outdoors displayed on the side of the house) using the Auxiliary video/audio cords. Worked great! Afterwards we used the HDMI cord to connect it to a Blu-ray player (outdoors at night against a white sheet). I also used an auxiliary cord I already had to connect to my wireless stereo to amplify the sound. No lag with latency, picture quality was great. Family is enjoying this so far. Comes with a nice case that fits all the cords that are included and the remote. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lailamel

customer_reviews.title: Good on the budget bad on the focus
customer_reviews.text: Definitely a great projector for the price. i originally bought this for jack O lantern projection and it works phenomenal with that. The down side is if your trying to use it at any range past 9 feet the fouse won't go any further. So you may get just under 120" with good picture focus but not any further. In short the whole projecting over 120" is clearly inaccurate. Also I would suggests using some kind of amp or surround sound system cuz the build in speakers just don't do it justice.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Anthony Loftus

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This is well worth the price! The fan is audible and a bit loud but you won’t notice it when you hook up your speaker. The picture quality is excellent and this comes with a nice case and remote. This projector requires an external hookup to a speaker so I recommend making sure you have an aux cord handy. We also invested in a tripod/tray and screen for this along with a fire stick. Overall a wonderful set up for less than $200! You can turn any space into a media room with this and I’d highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Jessica G.

customer_reviews.title: Great projector for the price and in inhome use.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this projector to show Halloween videos from inside our house. At first I used it on an upstairs window then went to a larger area in our garage door space. Made a frame and used a sheer curtain to show the ghostly video for trick or treaters. It worked very well. Could be seen from cars driving by. Hooked up small computer speakers to get louder sound for outside the garage. Very satisfied with the projector. The price was great for our purposes and it seems even cheaper now. Seems like it would work for great showing videos inside your home. We were very happy that this projector met our expectations for our Halloween night show.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Connected my phone to this TV
customer_reviews.text: I initially bought this for weeklong trips to my place at the beach, so I could stream Netflix from my phone (and see it in 80 inches of glory) and not signing up for cable/internet. Now I'm quarantined here and this projector is my TV...SCORE! Connects to iOS (using a firwire adapter); or Android (using a USB C adaptor for HDMI cable) Picture Quality: 8/10 Sound Quality: 4/10 (bypass this using a Bluetooth speaker) Brightness: 7/10 (close the blinds) Interface/Remote: 2/10 (remote and menu add almost no value beyond initial setup. Finish setup and skip this forevermore, by screen mirroring a mobile device or laptop and controlling the video directly from the device.)
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous User

customer_reviews.title: Overall a good projector for the price
customer_reviews.text: For the price this is a pretty nice projector. The projection is not very bright so the room needs to have little to no light for a better viewing experience. The picture clearance depends on the distance from the screen or wall. If you are looking for a projector for large screen viewing then this may not be your best option. If you are looking for a projector for some recreational viewing then this may work for you. I purchased this projector to screen art on the wall for painting murals & this works well. Overall a decent projector for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kathi Adam

customer_reviews.title: Artist blown away
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought the projector to paint murals and project artwork onto walls/canvases to trace. I had low expectations. However; I immediately found out how good it was and started using it to watch movies/shows on my ceiling. Now we plan to host outdoor movie nights with bonfires and s’mores. This projector far exceeded my expectations, wants and needs.
customer_reviews.author: ceroy minnang

customer_reviews.title: Great Projector for Social Distancing
customer_reviews.text: I bought the projector because I miss going to the movies and getting together with family. We were thinking of getting a projector and my brother in law recommended this one. It come in a padded carry case with pretty much all the connection cords needed. I have used it with both my iPhone and my Mac laptop. All I had to do was take it out of the box, connect a few cords and set up a screen. The picture is great for the money. I highly recommend this product if you want a movie night on your driveway with the family.
customer_reviews.author: Edwardo D. Vargas III

customer_reviews.title: Use it for an outdoor light feature!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't really buy this for conventional viewing. I decided to have a little fun with my back yard. I painted a segment of my wooden fence white, and use the projector to throw images on it. So I can sit out on my patio by the fire pit with a glass of wine and in the background enjoy pictures of my kids, vacations, etc. The projector can throw enough light through a window so I can keep it inside out of the weather pointing out at the fence. Doesn't work while its light outside but I tend to sit out back after dusk.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Gorback

customer_reviews.title: using for art
customer_reviews.text: wow i am completely shocked. i expected to return this because every other projector i used was horrible, blurry, etc. i bought this solely for tracing photos onto canvas and this projector shows every detail of the photo. what really helps is that you can adjust the contrast, brightness, color, sharpness & tint of the photo to whatever you’d like. if anyone is looking for a projector for art purposes, i 100% recommend this one
customer_reviews.author: r

customer_reviews.title: Great for the Price
customer_reviews.text: This is great for like bedroom or kids room. For what I need it for it work well. The picture is pretty good once it focus. It’s not like 4K or anything but it’s show pretty good. The vankyo series 3 come with a mini sound speaker is not as good.. so I advise you get a surround sound. The sound that you hear in the video is from surround sound I have So I will give it a 4.5 stars. Cons: the wording can be a little blurry. And the speaker.
customer_reviews.author: diva3647

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality for a Portable Projector
customer_reviews.text: We spent a lot of time looking for a projector that was going to be bright enough while still portable. In the couple of years that we have had this projector, we've been able to use it for countless outdoor movie nights, guys night gaming with friends, and other assorted projects. We love how small it is for the punch it packs because it has made taking it with us to friends' houses easy. Though there are quite a few brighter models available now (many sold by Vankyo), we're very happy with the one we have.
customer_reviews.author: J. Green

customer_reviews.title: Good Output Quality - Does not recognize all files
customer_reviews.text: I am impressed with the picture and sound quality. It also comes with a very good and useful case Pros: * Small and compact * Good picture quality * Good sound output Cons: * It does not pick up and recognizes all files. there are some files that it does not pick up. It is the same file type but some are just not being picked up Conclusion: While I am very happy with the picture and sound quality, since it does not pick up some files I do not recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Neal From NY

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: This was the worst purchase. I’m returning it ASAP . I was unable to get the picture onto my screen from my phone despite having bought all the listed accessories needed . In addition the entire thing is in German when you turn it on and we couldn’t even understand the commands to switch to English . We have no idea what the buttons on the device are for because they aren’t marked and again the display reads in German . The instructions included are not helpful at all either . Our night was ruined and we had to disassemble everything because of this projector.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Not bright enough, but customer service is good
customer_reviews.text: The advertised lumens on this Vankyo projector (2400 lux) are inflated. I compared this to a Sony 2400 lumens projector and the Vankyo is NOT EVEN CLOSE in brightness. This projector will only look bright in a completely dark room. This may be OK for personal use if you live in a rabbit hole. Also, the fan is loud. I contacted the manufacturer about the fan and they suggested to hook up a loud external speaker. UPDATE: customer service contacted me several times about my experience and wanted to make it right. I will raise this from 2 to 3 stars for their good customer service.
customer_reviews.author: SC

customer_reviews.title: Great little projector
customer_reviews.text: We have been happy with this little projector. We use it for outdoor movie night. It’s not the picture quality of an $800+ projector, but does a great job at a great price. We just use a white sheet tacked up but I’m sure a screen would off not better quality. The sound quality stinks tho, so we hook it up to a portable Bose speaker that we already had, and it works wonderfully. We use an Amazon Fire stick that we had and stream Disney plus, Amazon Prime, Netflix, Hulu, etc. haven’t tried hooking it up to anything else yet.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: It works!!!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter and her husband have had a couple of potluck parties where they show a kids movie after dark while the adults sit around the fire pit and solve the world's problems. They always had to borrow a projector. Well, not any longer! After doing some research and checking reviews I ordered this little gem for them to have. It works wonderfully. The set up is painless and it comes in a nice case with all of the attachment cords it might need to hook up to a variety of media sources. I am quite happy with this purchase. We have not yet used the remote. So I have no input to provide.
customer_reviews.author: MCG

customer_reviews.title: Easy setup, and clear picture
customer_reviews.text: This took under 5 minutes to setup. Just plugged it in to the wall, plugged our fire stick into the hdmi port, focused it, and watched our first movie on the wall. Also It came with an HDMI cable and a remote, which made working with this convenient. The manual that comes with this shows the highest distance at 18 feet with a 170 inch picture. We tried it out, and it was clear. Then we tried it at 10 feet and then again at 6 feet. Every thing looked great. My only complaint is that this could use a longer plugin chord. It is about 2 feet long.
customer_reviews.author: Vonda  Burton

customer_reviews.title: Great portable projector at a good price point.
customer_reviews.text: I have owned this projector for the past year and it has been amazing, especially considering the price. I use it for outdoor movies, movies inside the tent, and setting up a screen for special occasions for my kids. It is bright enough to use during dusk or later. I used it to do Halloween projections and it worked great as well. To do Halloween decorations I used a usb stick. I do slide shows using an sd card and the hdmi input is awesome to use for gaming or just to plug the fire stick into. Overall it’s a great unit in a nice case that can be taken anywhere you have power.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Both the brightest, not the sharpest, not the best for $100
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to order this after having a great experience a few years ago with ordering a projector from amazon, which turned out to be very good. When I got this one, it worked and was quiet, but I was expecting the same brightness and sharpness of the one I had ordered before. This vankyo projector provided a picture that was not very bright at all, and also was fuzzy around the edges. I returned this one when I realized the model I used before had upgraded the model I had the last time. If you’re wondering, it is a DBpower brand projector that ran me 97 bucks... It gives me a MUCH brighter, and much more clear picture.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny hall

customer_reviews.title: Great Personal Project
customer_reviews.text: This is a great projector for personal use. I got this as a gift since we will be needing a projector for backyard use so we can do movie nights while enjoying the outdoors. So far this was super easy as far as set up pretty much plug and play..we use it with the fire stick. The picture is nice for the price. Only thing I don't like is I only wish it had adjustable legs so it's easier than using books. The volume is pretty decent, it's not surrounded sound but it works pretty decent and it's nice to have a remote to change the volume. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Vegan Tasting TX

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME little Projector!!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a projector for my ATMOS Christmas outdoor decorations. The projectors that were available though the companies that specialize in these decorations had only 1000 lumes which was half of this projector. After reading the reviews from others and reading the specs it was apparent that this was much better. Plus it was only $40 on Black Friday! As you can see from the pictures the video is nice and bright and shows the video images very well from outside. I loaded up the videos on a micro SD card then inserted into the projector. It comes with a nice remote and audio/video cables. I'm very happy with this setup!
customer_reviews.author: R13

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: For the price and my purpose, this is an amazing little projector! I played with the picture settings a bit and got a decent image for my needs. The focusing capabilities are great and the use of my fire stick is fantastic! I can’t wait to add speakers (the sound quality through the projector’s speakers was fine for my initial use). I love that I got the one with the case and I can’t wait to use this again! Totally worth it for a first time projector owner! *ps the photo isn’t taken in a dark room, the wall is grey, and the settings are from straight out of the box. Pretty darn great!
customer_reviews.author: ashleigh

customer_reviews.title: for a very small group
customer_reviews.text: If you want something small and somewhat quiet that is for a small group to view this might work for you. The instructions say to be about 4' away from the screen which means it is going to be small. Any further back and the picture isn't clear. I am going to continue to work with this to see if I can get it to be clearer but right now I would not recommend it. We didn't try the remote control yet, that will be my next try.
customer_reviews.author: Soaps

customer_reviews.title: Pretty sweet and fun to use!
customer_reviews.text: I received this projector as a gift from my girlfriend. We absolutely love it. We use it to watch tv in bed, play video games, and just relax! The carrying case is a convenient addition to the packaging so it makes transporting the projector really simple. It comes with a variety of cords and a decent remote. The only thing that would improve this device would be a simpler way to connect a cell phone to the projector. We ended up having to locate a separate adapter in order to use it with our iPhones . Other than that the projector is a pretty awesome gift. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Great picture, easy setup!
customer_reviews.text: Package arrived sooner than expected. It comes in a really nice carrying case with almost all the different connectors you could use. I had read reviews and ordered a lightning cable for my iPhone to attach to the projector. I’m able to connect to my phone super easily and watched Netflix and Prime videos from it so far. It’s a great big picture. I also connected my blu ray player to it with the hdmi to hdmi cable. The sound is good. We will try to use a sound bar with it when we use it outdoors. Really great quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: I'm sure it'd be great with lower expectations
customer_reviews.text: I currently have a higher-quality projector (Ricoh PJ WXC1110), which I am looking to replace, which appears as if it's just a large TV on the wall. However, this projector does not appear clearly (due to the native 800x400 resolution) in text or in image. I think I was expecting the perfect image to be projected from my computer onto the wall, but it was about 1/3 of the quality and appeared pixelated. I am sure I just need to look into higher res projectors, but this isn't the one for me; therefore, I am currently returning it as I anticipated higher quality by the ranking and reviews of this projector on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Zero Customer Support, Product Does Not Connect to my MacBook Pro
customer_reviews.text: Despite watching multiple YouTube videos on how to connect my MacBook Pro to a projector (Vankyo has no videos on how to set up their product), my display panel would not recognize this projector as an alternate screen. I emailed Vankyo about the problem and got no response. There are minimal instructions provided with the projector and no information on the Vankyo website. Apparently, Vankyo has outsourced their customer support to Amazon as there are almost 1000 questions about this product, which are all answered by other customers. I waded through all these questions to see if someone had a similar problem, but couldn't find an answer. For me, a complete waste of time and energy.
customer_reviews.author: Blackbird Fly

customer_reviews.title: Great projector for its price point!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this projector for my boyfriend and I’s 2 year anniversary. I wanted to use it outside during a little picnic I set up for us at a park gazebo but I haven’t gotten the chance to yet, I have no doubt it’ll work great though. Instead, we’ve been using it to watch movies on our bedroom ceiling while we lay in bed - greatest decision ever. Very impressed by the quality considering the price. Speaker could be better/louder but it does the job and the soft humming from the projector itself isn’t too distracting. I don’t know much about projectors but overall, great bang for your buck.
customer_reviews.author: Rose Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: It gets a pretty clear picture
customer_reviews.text: This is an impressive little projector, especially for the price. This is my third attempt at getting a small, but affordable projector and hoping for acceptable quality. This projector definitely exceeded expectations. It gets a pretty clear picture. The sound is good for home use, but if you plan on using this outdoors or with a lot of people you might want to connect some speakers. It gets the brightest and clearest picture in very dark spaces, the darker the space, the better the picture will be. I was able to hook up my Amazon Fire to it and watch NETFLIX without any problems. This has basically allowed us to turn our spare bedroom into a movie room.
customer_reviews.author: kikoran

customer_reviews.title: Product worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I am an educational trainer. I purchased the VANKYO LEISURE so I could practice my training at home due to COVID-19. The set up of the projector was very easy. I like the fact that it comes in its own bag with a remote control, power, HDMI, VGA, and TV connection chords. It’s compact and lightweight. The projector can be displayed in day or night but works best in a darker room. The quality of the picture is not the best, but was awesome for the purpose I used it for. For the price, it’s worth the purchase! I’m very pleased with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Young

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: First, you have to keep in mind the price. I paid less than 70 dollars with the coupon. For that price, this is great! A few years ago I would not have been able to imagine a projector for under 100. It is not bright enough to be usable during the day. But bright enough for night time viewing. It is fairly quiet and the fan nose is not distracting. The video quality is great for dvds. We used ours at about 12 to 14 feet on a 120 inch screen. It has a LED bulb, and so will hopefully be long lasting. Overall, I would really recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

product_meta.title: VANKYO LEISURE 3 Mini Projector, 1080P and 170'' Display Supported, Portable Movie Projector with 40,000 Hrs LED Lamp Life, Compatible with TV Stick, PS4, HDMI, VGA, TF, AV and USB
feature_bullets: SUPERIOR VIEWING EXPERIENCE: Supporting 1920x1080 resolution, VANKYO Leisure 3 projector is powered by MStar Advanced Color Engine, which is ideal for home entertainment. 2020 upgraded LED lighting provides a superior viewing experience for you. (Not recommend for PowerPoint or other office presentation)

MULTIMEDIA PORTABLE PROJECTOR: VANKYO Leisure 3 projector is perfect for video viewing, TV series watching as well as photo browsing. It can be easily connected to your smartphone, PS3, PS4, X-Box ONE or Wii to enjoy diversified games. A customized bag is designed for easy carry and convenient storage.

BIG SCREEN SIZE: It provides a watching size from 32” to 170” with the projection distance between 4.9ft to 16.4ft. 6.5 ft is the recommended viewing distance and it’s straightforward to achieve a clear and regular image by the focus and keystone correction adjusting.

FAN NOISE SUPPRESSION SYSTEM: VANKYO projectors are equipped with an innovative cooling system which contains heat dispersion and noise suppression technology that halves the fan sound. (Power input : 100V-240V 50/60Hz)

SMARTPHONE CONNECTION AVAILABLE: Without installing any app, you can easily realize the smart-phone connection. An extra Lightning to HDMI adapter is needed for iPhone connection while Micro USB/Type C to HDMI adapter is needed for Android phone connection.(Adapter is sold separately)
